features.title: Advanced Personality Analytics
features.subtitle: A powerful AI platform that blends psychology, analytics, and machine learning to unlock customer understanding, competitive positioning, and strategic market insights.

gamified.title: Gamified Micro-Experiences
gamified.description: Interactive surveys designed to drive engagement and collect rich psychographic data effortlessly.

psychographic.title: Identify Psychographic Profiles
psychographic.description: Advanced algorithms uncover actionable insights from customer behavior, going beyond traditional A/B testing to optimize decision-making.

ctas.title: Hyper-Personalized CTAs
ctas.description: Dynamic call-to-action generation designed to deliver tailored offers, recommendations, and messages that maximize engagement.

businessIntelligence.title: Turn Insights Into Strategic Advantage
businessIntelligence.subtitle: Gain strategic clarity through a Business Intelligence Suite that decode behavior patterns and transform psychographic data into decision-ready business insights.
businessIntelligence.feature1: Dashboards highlight campaign performance and audience engagement
businessIntelligence.feature2: Traits, behaviors and recommended products charts uncover drivers of decision-making and loyalty
businessIntelligence.feature3: Compare against industry benchmarks, market fit, features priorities and much more

industries.title: Industry-Specific Solutions
industries.subtitle: From market validation to hyper-personalized engagement, PersonalysisPro adapts to any industry's needs to drive performance.

finance.title: Finance & Insurance
finance.description: Move beyond past data with predictive psychographic insights that let you design products, content, and acquisition strategies aligned with deeper consumer traits.
finance.benefit1: Hyper-personalized campaigns based on personality clusters
finance.benefit2: Identify communication styles that improve conversion
finance.benefit3: Refine product targeting with risk and trust indicators

marketResearch.title: Market Research & Insight Providers
marketResearch.description: Add new layer of behavioral intelligence for every project and transform traditional surveys into immersive, data-rich psychographic experiences.
marketResearch.benefit1: Reveal emotional motivators behind consumer choices
marketResearch.benefit2: Deliver premium insights to win higher-value clients
marketResearch.benefit3: Automated underwriting based on AI personality data

marketing.title: Marketing Agencie & E-commerce
marketing.description: Transform your marketing strategy with deep personality-based insights that predict consumer behavior and preferences.
marketing.benefit2: Increased conversion rates with psychometric targeting
marketing.benefit3: Enhanced product recommendations with personality matching

venture.title: Venture Capital & Business Builders
venture.description: Gain a competitive edge in investment decisions with market fit insights so you can shape, pivot, or scale ventures based on cognitive resonance with your audience.
venture.benefit1: Define feature priorities based on the market gap
venture.benefit2: Focus group simulation with just a prompt
venture.benefit3: Define makret, pricing strategies and revenue forecast

growth.title: Drive Business Growth
growth.benefit1: Increase customer retention by up to 40%
growth.benefit2: Optimize marketing campaigns with personality-based targeting

insights.title: Actionable Insights

contactPage.metaDescription: Get in touch with the PersonalysisPro team to learn more about our personality profiling platform or request a demo.
contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: Have questions or want to see PersonalysisPro in action? Get in touch with our team or request a personalized demo.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.subtitle: Get in touch with our team to learn more about how PersonalysisPro can help your business understand customers, employees, and markets through advanced personality insights.
contactUs.successMessage: Thank you for contacting us. We'll respond to your inquiry shortly.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

contactUs.faq1Answer: PersonalysisPro is an AI-powered personality assessment platform that helps businesses better understand their customers, employees, and markets through sophisticated personality analysis, enabling more personalized experiences and data-driven decisions.
contactUs.faq2Answer: Our platform uses advanced machine learning algorithms to analyze responses to carefully designed surveys, providing deep insights into personality traits, preferences, and behavioral patterns that can inform business strategy and customer engagement.
contactUs.faq3Answer: Yes, we take data security very seriously. All data is encrypted both in transit and at rest, and we comply with GDPR, CCPA, and other relevant privacy regulations. For more details, please see our Privacy Policy.
contactUs.faq4Answer: Yes, we offer customized solutions tailored to your organization's specific needs. Our team can work with you to create bespoke assessment tools, integrate with your existing systems, and develop specialized reports and dashboards.
contactUs.faq5Answer: We offer various pricing tiers based on your organization's size and needs. Please contact our sales team to discuss the best option for you and receive a customized quote.
contactUs.faq6Question: Do you offer a free trial?
contactUs.faq6Answer: Yes, we offer a limited free trial that allows you to explore the platform's capabilities before committing. You can sign up for a trial or request a demo through our website.
contactUs.stillHaveQuestions: Still have questions? We're here to help!
contactUs.newsletterSubtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest news, product updates, and insights about personality assessment in business.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Content: PersonalysisPro ("we," "our," or "us") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting it through our compliance with this policy. This policy describes the types of information we may collect from you or that you may provide when you use our personality assessment platform and our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting, and disclosing that information.

aboutUs.title: About PersonalysisPro
aboutUs.subtitle: Unlock next-gen customer intelligence with AI-driven behavioral predictions, built on Stanford, Google, and Nobel-backed psychological research.
aboutUs.ourStoryTitle: Redefining customer understanding from the ground up
aboutUs.ourStoryParagraph1: PersonalysisPro was born out of a clear gap in the way businesses made decisions: relying on surface-level, historical data that failed to reveal why customers behave the way they do.
aboutUs.ourStoryParagraph2: We saw the need for a new kind of intelligence — one rooted in behavioral science, not just clickstreams. That's why our founders, a team of psychologists, data scientists, and strategists, set out to build a platform that translates personality data into strategic value.
aboutUs.ourStoryParagraph3: By decoding the psychological layers behind decisions, PersonalysisPro equips businesses to anticipate preferences, fine-tune messaging, and build lasting loyalty with precision.
aboutUs.ourMissionTitle: Bridging human psychology and business strategy
aboutUs.ourMissionParagraph1: PersonalysisPro empower companies design smarter, more human-centric strategies by tapping into the traits, motivations, and decision-making styles of their audiences. From product innovation to performance marketing, every business move with what truly resonates at a cognitive level.
aboutUs.ourMissionParagraph2: We believe that by understanding the personality traits, cognitive patterns, and behavioral tendencies of customers, businesses can create products, services, and experiences that truly resonate with their audience.
aboutUs.ourMissionParagraph3: Through ethical data practices and scientific rigor, we aim to bridge the gap between customer analytics and human psychology.
aboutUs.technologySubtitle: PersonalysisPro is built on a multidisciplinary foundation that blends psychology, data science, and AI to map out the intricate landscape of human behavior.
aboutUs.nobelScienceDescription: Rooted in behavioral economics and psychology, our models incorporate Nobel Prize-winning research, our framework identifies over 35 distinct personality traits.
aboutUs.aiEngineDescription: Our proprietary algorithms analyze behavioral patterns to create comprehensive digital profiles with remarkable predictive accuracy.
aboutUs.digitalTwinDescription: Leveraging advanced research from Stanford University and Google, we create psychological digital twins that simulate real users by enabling precise hyper-personalized behavioral predictions.
aboutUs.valuesSubtitle: The principles powering our mission to revolutionize human understanding at scale.
aboutUs.value1Description: We made Nobel-backed behavioral psychology and Stanford-validated models accessible to every business into a scalable digital tool.
aboutUs.value2Description: Our insights begin with trust. We uphold transparent, privacy-first practices that exceed industry standards and ensure ethical use of psychometric and behavioral data.
aboutUs.value3Description: We don't follow trends, we set them. From AI-powered digital twins to predictive modeling, we continuously push the frontier of what's possible in customer intelligence.
aboutUs.value4Description: Every insight we deliver is built to create measurable business impact: sharper segmentation, higher conversion, and smarter decision-making at every touchpoint.
aboutUs.ctaSubtitle: Discover how PersonalysisPro can help your business understand customers at a deeper level and make more informed strategic decisions.
aboutUs.demoDialogDescription: Fill out the form below to schedule a personalized demo of our personality assessment platform for your business.
aboutUs.name: Name

press.title: Press & News
press.subtitle: Stay up-to-date with the latest news, press releases, and media coverage about PersonalysisPro's innovative personality assessment platform for businesses.
press.overview1: PersonalysisPro is the leading enterprise platform for AI-powered personality assessment and insights. Our platform helps businesses better understand their customers, employees, and markets through sophisticated personality analysis, enabling more personalized experiences and data-driven decisions.
press.overview2: Founded in 2023 by a team of experienced technologists and organizational psychologists, PersonalysisPro has quickly grown to serve hundreds of enterprise clients worldwide. The company is headquartered in San Francisco with additional offices in New York and London.
press.tryAdjustingFilters: Try adjusting your search filters or check back later for new releases.
press.mediaInquiriesText: For press inquiries, interview requests, or additional information about PersonalysisPro, please contact our communications team.
press.pressKitText: Download our press kit for company information, executive bios, logo files, product images, and other resources for media coverage.
press.stayUpdatedText: Subscribe to our press releases and company news to receive the latest updates directly in your inbox.

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.subtitle: We're on a mission to revolutionize how businesses understand people through personality insights. If you're passionate about psychology, AI, and creating impactful solutions, we'd love to meet you!
careers.peopleFirstDesc: We believe in the potential of every individual and create an inclusive environment where diverse perspectives thrive.
careers.innovationDesc: We're constantly pushing boundaries, experimenting with new ideas, and finding creative solutions to complex problems.
careers.dataDrivenDesc: We make decisions based on data and research, combining scientific methods with human-centered design.
careers.impactDesc: We're focused on creating meaningful change by helping businesses better understand and serve their customers.
careers.benefitsSubtitle: We believe in taking care of our team with competitive compensation and benefits that support your health, wealth, and well-being.
careers.noPositionsText: Try adjusting your search filters or check back later for new openings.
careers.step1Desc: Our recruiting team carefully reviews your application and resume
careers.step2Desc: A 30-minute video call to discuss your experience and interest
careers.step3Desc: A practical exercise relevant to the role you're applying for
careers.step4Desc: Meet with potential teammates and cross-functional partners
careers.readyToJoinText: Browse our open positions and find the perfect fit for your skills and passion.
